original_title: Rock Hard 1 The Ultimate Masturbation Experience
overview: The ultimate masturbation experience featuring Falcon's Mystery Skier and Leigh Erickson plus the winner of the "86 Superman" contest, Drake Horton. The ever-popular Jason "Hard Men" Lowe and coverman Allen Fox - with a taste of leather. Plus newcomer Eric Radford and Joe "Bigger Than Life" Gibbons. Two versions were release one by LA Video, the original releaser, and one by Jocks/Falcon.
title: Rock Hard 1 The Ultimate Masturbation Experience
